extendedInfo.description: The pig world is in danger! Follow the four heroes of ham through the fires of hell and use brains, brawn and bacon to stop the Aporkalypse!FULL FEATURED & FREE (with ads!)Features:- Crazy aporkalyptic action adventure- 4 characters with unique powers- Innovative puzzles with multiple pigs- 60 challenging levels- Collect coins for your piggy bank- Funny comic worldWe have a pig problem! According to an old prophecy the four Pigs of Doom should proclaim the end of the world in a distant future. But something went terribly wrong and the gates of heaven and hell have already opened! Now it is up to the greedy Hunger Pig, the heavily armed War Pig, the contaminous Pest Pig and the ghostly Death Pig to stop this madness. Lead the pigs through a collapsing world full of puzzles and dangers! Combine their supernatural powers and find unforseen riches. Don't cast pearls before swine but collect coins for your piggy bank! Send angels and demons back to where they belong. Nobody can escape the wrath of the pigs!* Xperia PLAY optimized *Supports App 2 SDhttp://www.handy-games.comhttp://www.facebook.com/handygames http://www.twitter.com/handy_games

reviews.title: BEST OF BEST
reviews.comment: Very nice game......  Nt easy and too much fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cute pig
reviews.comment: Nice game just download and play it!! Fun.fun.fun

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Best app ever. So much fun. Great graphics. Challenging and addictive!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So....... A-MA-ZING
reviews.comment: This games is sooo.... cool i love it. Thinky and entertaining at the same time i give it 6 STARS
reviews.author: Bryana Sanchez

reviews.title: Relatively Good Fun
reviews.comment: A Relatively good game that\'s quite fun. Although, it is also annoying as the control pad is in the right-hand side (I\'m left handed). There should be an option to change it.
reviews.author: Miss Shy

reviews.comment: Could not wait to play it on andriod phone... The old .jar version was cool....and i expect the same 1 from this too...woooooohhhhhoooooB-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: There isn\'t much to say about the game,it\'s great,lots of fun,great levels and gameplay.Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Was working well,  then stared to force close between levels,  and ull have to repeat the last level.
reviews.author: moha o

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Cute, fun game! Levels are challenging. Have to really think in order to pass each level. Love, love, love this game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Aporkalypse is a very fun, yet challenging game. I have many games downloaded, and this is the only one that allows this much.intuition. Not to mention the War Pig haha. Very good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Blue will win
reviews.comment: Great You should play it . Ut the beginning you got this pig what can get hay sacks in it\'s mouth but it can spit it out a few levels after you can get an another pig but I don\'t now what he\'s name is but I wood call him pig soldier and I don\'t no  eney levels else.
reviews.author: Lewis Calder

reviews.title: So much fun - no porkies!
reviews.comment: I love puzzle games, especially quirky ones with a light story n humour. Reminds me of a game called \'push\' on an ancient Trium phone.  Fun characters, fun simple graphics that never freezes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So entertaining
reviews.comment: That I don\'t even mind the ads! Great humerous time-passer!
reviews.author: Amber Mattingley

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Brilliant game. Really cute graphics. Great game play.  Love it. One of the best games ive found. 5 stars.
reviews.author: rachel hamer

reviews.comment: Already finished the game. But now I\'m installing it again because I\'m missing the game very addicted I can\'t stop playing over and over again.

reviews.title: Can\'t put it down
reviews.comment: I like the idea that they used pigs for the role. :)  Its graphics nd design are cute. Mind teaser. It\'s a great game.

reviews.comment: Kinda zelda like puzzles! Totally enjoying the s%#* out of this one great job
